mapper.sql: id, userName, nickName, profileUrl, signature, refree, freeNum, registerTime, registerType, createDate, updateDate
mapper.select: SELECT count( aos.orderId ) AS countNum, IFNULL( sum( aos.totalAmount ), 0 ) AS amount FROM app_order_success aos WHERE aos.userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT aub.id, aub.userName, aub.nickName, aub.profileUrl, aub.signature, aub.refree, aub.freeNum, aub.registerTime, aub.registerType, aub.createDate, aub.updateDate, CASE aub.registerType WHEN 0 THEN 'H5' WHEN 1 THEN 'APP' ELSE '' END AS registerTypeStr, count( te.id ) AS usedFreeNum FROM app_user_base aub LEFT JOIN t_exchange te ON aub.userName = te.userName GROUP BY aub.userName
mapper.insert: insert into app_user_base (id, userName, nickName, profileUrl, signature, refree, freeNum, registerTime, registerType, createDate, updateDate) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{registerType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into app_user_base
id,
userName,
nickName,
profileUrl,
signature,
refree,
freeNum,
registerTime,
registerType,
createDate,
updateDate,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{profileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{refree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{freeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{registerType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update app_user_base
userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickName = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profileUrl = #{profileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
signature = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refree = #{refree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
freeNum = #{freeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
registerTime = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
registerType = #{registerType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateDate = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update app_user_base set userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickName = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profileUrl = #{profileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signature = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refree = #{refree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, freeNum = #{freeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, registerTime = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, registerType = #{registerType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateDate = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
